ai-atk-vin02a42:12_0: At the moment when he has broken thus in any instance of the seven classes of offenses or at the beginning, he is called a cute of shower of his virtue, like a cloth that is cut at the edge.
ai-atk-vin02a42:12_1: When he has broken it in the middle, it is called rent, like a cloth that is rent in the middle.
ai-atk-vin02a42:12_2: When he has broken it twice or thrice in succession, it is called blotched, like a cow whose body is some such colour as black or red with a discrepant colour appearing on the back or the belly.
ai-atk-vin02a42:12_3: When he has broken it all over at intervals, it is called mottled, like a cow speckled all over with discrepant- coloured spots at intervals.
